name: Hire Warehouse Worker
description: Hire a warehouse worker to help with the daily operations. This increases efficiency and allows for faster processing of orders.

name: Discounted Shipping Rates
description: Negotiate discounted shipping rates with carriers to reduce shipping costs and increase profit margins.

name: Set Product Shipping Presets
description: Set up shipping presets for products to streamline the shipping process and reduce errors.
gameEffect: Eliminates a shipping step - inputting weights & dimensions!

name: Bundles: 2-Packs
description: Kitting & bundling products together to create new 2-pack products that sell at a higher price.
gameEffect: Double the sales price of your products.

name: Rate Shopper
description: Automatically compare shipping rates from multiple carriers to find the best rate for each shipment.
gameEffect: Eliminates a shipping step - shopping for rates!

name: Fire Sale
description: Run a fire sale to clear out old inventory and make room for new products.
gameEffect: Generate more orders for a short period of time but reduce profit by 10%

name: Order Grid Filters
description: Add filters to the order grid to quickly find and prioritize orders based on specific criteria.
gameEffect: Ships orders who are expiring soon first.
